description: Generates a comprehensive report when Claude Code workflow stops, including files modified, tests run, and git status
author: JSONbored
useCases: Analyze test coverage and quality metrics
Create historical record of workflow sessions
Generate reports for team review and analysis
Archive session data for project documentation

configuration.scriptContent:
#!/bin/bash

echo "ğŸ“Š â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•"
echo "ğŸ¯ WORKFLOW COMPLETION REPORT"
echo "ğŸ“… Session Completed: $(date)"
echo "â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•"

# Session metadata
SESSION_ID="session-$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)"
COMPLETION_TIME=$(date)
START_TIME="unknown"
USER=$(whoami 2>/dev/null || echo "developer")
HOST=$(hostname 2>/dev/null || echo "unknown")
WORKDIR=$(pwd)
PROJECT_NAME=$(basename "$WORKDIR" 2>/dev/null || echo "project")

echo "ğŸ·ï¸ Session Info:"
echo "  â€¢ Session ID: $SESSION_ID"
echo "  â€¢ Project: $PROJECT_NAME"
echo "  â€¢ User: $USER@$HOST"
echo "  â€¢ Directory: $WORKDIR"

# Attempt to determine session duration
if [ -d ".claude" ] && [ "$(find .claude -type f 2>/dev/null | wc -l)" -gt 0 ]; then
    START_TIMESTAMP=$(stat -f %B .claude/*.log 2>/dev/null | sort | head -1 || date +%s)
    END_TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s)
    DURATION=$((END_TIMESTAMP - START_TIMESTAMP))
    HOURS=$((DURATION / 3600))
    MINUTES=$(((DURATION % 3600) / 60))
    echo "  â€¢ Duration: ${HOURS}h ${MINUTES}m"
else
    echo "  â€¢ Duration: Unknown (no .claude directory)"
fi

echo ""
echo "ğŸ“ File System Analysis:"
echo "â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•"

# Git analysis
if git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "ğŸ“Š Git Repository Status:"
    
    BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "unknown")
    echo "  â€¢ Current branch: $BRANCH"
    
    # Count modified files
    MODIFIED_FILES=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' ')
    echo "  â€¢ Modified files: $MODIFIED_FILES"
    
    # Show file status breakdown
    if [ "$MODIFIED_FILES" -gt 0 ]; then
        echo "  â€¢ File status breakdown:"
        git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | cut -c1-2 | sort | uniq -c | while read -r count status; do
            case "$status" in
                "M "*) echo "    - Modified: $count files" ;;
                "A "*) echo "    - Added: $count files" ;;
                "D "*) echo "    - Deleted: $count files" ;;
                "??"*) echo "    - Untracked: $count files" ;;
                *) echo "    - Other ($status): $count files" ;;
            esac
        done
    fi
    
    # Diff statistics
    DIFF_STATS=$(git diff --stat 2>/dev/null)
    if [ -n "$DIFF_STATS" ]; then
        echo "  â€¢ Changes summary:"
        echo "$DIFF_STATS" | tail -1 | sed 's/^/    /' 2>/dev/null || echo "    No statistics available"
    fi
    
    # List modified files (top 10)
    if [ "$MODIFIED_FILES" -gt 0 ]; then
        echo "  â€¢ Modified files (top 10):"
        git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | head -10 | while read -r status file; do
            echo "    - $file ($status)"
        done
    fi
    
    # Recent commits
    echo "  â€¢ Recent commits:"
    git log --oneline -3 2>/dev/null | sed 's/^/    /' || echo "    No recent commits"
    
else
    echo "â“ Not a git repository"
    echo "  â€¢ Analyzing file system changes..."
    
    # Alternative: look for recently modified files
    echo "  â€¢ Recently modified files (last 2 hours):"
    find . -type f -newermt '2 hours ago' 2>/dev/null | head -10 | while read -r file; do
        echo "    - $file"
    done
fi

echo ""
echo "ğŸ§ª Testing & Quality Analysis:"
echo "â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•"

# Test framework detection and analysis
TEST_FRAMEWORK="none"
TEST_COUNT=0

if [ -f "package.json" ]; then
    echo "ğŸ“¦ Node.js Project Analysis:"
    
    # Detect test framework
    if grep -q '"jest"' package.json 2>/dev/null; then
        TEST_FRAMEWORK="jest"
        echo "  â€¢ Testing framework: Jest"
    elif grep -q '"vitest"' package.json 2>/dev/null; then
        TEST_FRAMEWORK="vitest"
        echo "  â€¢ Testing framework: Vitest"
    elif grep -q '"mocha"' package.json 2>/dev/null; then
        TEST_FRAMEWORK="mocha"
        echo "  â€¢ Testing framework: Mocha"
    else
        echo "  â€¢ Testing framework: Not detected"
    fi
    
    # Count test files
    TEST_COUNT=$(find . -name "*.test.*" -o -name "*.spec.*" | grep -v node_modules | wc -l | tr -d ' ')
    echo "  â€¢ Test files found: $TEST_COUNT"
    
    # Dependencies analysis
    DEPS_COUNT=$(jq -r '.dependencies // {} | keys | length' package.json 2>/dev/null || echo "unknown")
    DEV_DEPS_COUNT=$(jq -r '.devDependencies // {} | keys | length' package.json 2>/dev/null || echo "unknown")
    echo "  â€¢ Dependencies: $DEPS_COUNT production, $DEV_DEPS_COUNT development"
    
    # Check for outdated packages
    echo "  â€¢ Checking for outdated packages..."
    OUTDATED_COUNT=$(npm outdated 2>/dev/null | tail -n +2 | wc -l | tr -d ' ')
    if [ "$OUTDATED_COUNT" -gt 0 ]; then
        echo "    - $OUTDATED_COUNT packages have updates available"
    else
        echo "    - All packages are up to date"
    fi
    
elif [ -f "requirements.txt" ] || [ -f "setup.py" ] || [ -f "pyproject.toml" ]; then
    echo "ğŸ Python Project Analysis:"
    
    if command -v pytest >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        TEST_FRAMEWORK="pytest"
        echo "  â€¢ Testing framework: pytest"
        TEST_COUNT=$(find . -name "test_*.py" -o -name "*_test.py" | wc -l | tr -d ' ')
    else
        echo "  â€¢ Testing framework: unittest (built-in)"
        TEST_COUNT=$(find . -name "test*.py" | wc -l | tr -d ' ')
    fi
    echo "  â€¢ Test files found: $TEST_COUNT"
    
elif [ -f "Cargo.toml" ]; then
    echo "ğŸ¦€ Rust Project Analysis:"
    echo "  â€¢ Testing framework: Built-in (cargo test)"
    TEST_COUNT=$(find . -name "*.rs" -exec grep -l "#\[test\]" {} \; | wc -l | tr -d ' ')
    echo "  â€¢ Files with tests: $TEST_COUNT"
    
else
    echo "â“ Project type not recognized"
fi

# Performance and metrics
echo ""
echo "ğŸ“ˆ Performance & Metrics:"
echo "â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•"

# Code complexity analysis (basic)
if [ "$TEST_COUNT" -gt 0 ]; then
    echo "âœ… Test Coverage Status:"
    echo "  â€¢ Test files available: $TEST_COUNT"
    echo "  â€¢ Testing framework: $TEST_FRAMEWORK"
else
    echo "âš ï¸ No test files detected"
fi

# File type analysis
echo "ğŸ“Š Codebase Composition:"
for ext in js ts jsx tsx py rs go java c cpp; do
    count=$(find . -name "*.$ext" | grep -v node_modules | wc -l | tr -d ' ')
    if [ "$count" -gt 0 ]; then
        echo "  â€¢ .$ext files: $count"
    fi
done

# Lines of code estimation
TOTAL_LOC=$(find . -type f \( -name "*.js" -o -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.jsx" -o -name "*.tsx" -o -name "*.py" -o -name "*.rs" -o -name "*.go" \) | grep -v node_modules | xargs wc -l 2>/dev/null | tail -1 | awk '{print $1}' || echo "unknown")
echo "  â€¢ Estimated lines of code: $TOTAL_LOC"

# Session archival
echo ""
echo "ğŸ’¾ Session Archival:"
echo "â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•"

# Create session report file
REPORT_FILE=".claude-reports/$SESSION_ID.log"
mkdir -p .claude-reports

cat > "$REPORT_FILE" << EOF
CLAUDE CODE WORKFLOW COMPLETION REPORT
======================================

Session ID: $SESSION_ID
Completed: $COMPLETION_TIME
Project: $PROJECT_NAME
User: $USER@$HOST
Directory: $WORKDIR

FILE CHANGES:
$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null || echo "Not a git repository")

DIFF STATISTICS:
$(git diff --stat 2>/dev/null || echo "No git changes")

TEST STATUS:
- Framework: $TEST_FRAMEWORK
- Test files: $TEST_COUNT

PROJECT METRICS:
- Total LOC (estimated): $TOTAL_LOC
- Modified files: $MODIFIED_FILES

EOF

echo "ğŸ“„ Session report saved: $REPORT_FILE"
echo "ğŸ“ Report directory: .claude-reports/"

# Cleanup old reports (keep last 30)
find .claude-reports -name "session-*.log" | sort | head -n -30 | xargs rm -f 2>/dev/null

echo ""
echo "ğŸ’¡ Workflow Summary:"
echo "â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•"
echo "  â€¢ Session completed successfully"
echo "  â€¢ Files modified: $MODIFIED_FILES"
echo "  â€¢ Test files available: $TEST_COUNT"
echo "  â€¢ Project type: $([ -f package.json ] && echo 'Node.js' || [ -f requirements.txt ] && echo 'Python' || [ -f Cargo.toml ] && echo 'Rust' || echo 'Unknown')"
echo "  â€¢ Git repository: $([ -d .git ] && echo 'Yes' || echo 'No')"

echo ""
echo "ğŸ¯ Next Steps:"
echo "  â€¢ Review all changes before committing"
echo "  â€¢ Run tests to ensure code quality"
echo "  â€¢ Update documentation if needed"
echo "  â€¢ Consider code review for significant changes"

echo ""
echo "ğŸ“Š â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•"
echo "ğŸ‰ Workflow completion report generated successfully!"
echo "ğŸ“‹ Full report available at: $REPORT_FILE"
echo "â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•"

exit 0
